content.body: Commented on the issue; the deadline only applies to stage advancement, not to non-advancement normative items
you can add a non-advancement item the day of if you want (but it’d be reasonable for someone to withhold consensus out of a desire to spend more time thinking about it)
ljharb: I won't be present at next week's meeting
content.formatted_body: ljharb: I won't be present at next week's meeting

content.body: if I’m not too exhausted I’m happy to present it, otherwise we can wait til the next meeting after it
